item.description:
Please join us for an end of summer foraging event at Green Meadows Farm! Iris Weaver will lead the group through the forest and field edges where we will learn to identify native edible and medicinal plants. We also learn a bit about which plants flourish within the different ecological niches of this varied site. We might also be able to gather some shagbark hickory nuts!

The loose agenda:
2:00- Meet and greet in the parking lot near the farm stand entrance
2:15- Head out to the wilds
4:00- Wrap up and share a snack from home or the farm stand

Please bring:
A snack to share with the group
Appropriate footwear for possibly wet areas
Mosquito repellant
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be hanging out by the farm stand
item.name: Summer's End Foraging at Green Meadows
